name: Image With Critical Vulnerabilities
description: This control lists all container images in which critical vulnerabilities were identified in their last vulnerability scan.
remediation: Kubescape vulnerability scan provides information about available fixes and their corresponding image versions. Apply as many as possible available fixes and make sure that remaining vulnerable images follow the vulnerabilities least privileged principle as suggested by other controls in this framework. This will reduce probability of potential exposure.
long_description: This control lists all container images in which critical vulnerabilities were identified in their last vulnerability scan.
test: This control check last image vulnerability scan results.
